tha-ap503:14.4: yenicchakā yadicchakā → yenicchakā yathicchakaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | yadicchakāyadicchakā (mr)
tha-ap503:15.4: bibbohanasamāyutaṃ → bimbohanasamāyutaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, csp1ed)
tha-ap503:18.2: sāyaṃ pātamupaṭṭhahuṃ → sāyaṃ pātaṃ upaṭṭhahuṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sāyapātamupaṭṭhahuṃ (csp1ed)
